Subject: Uphill battle
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 Apocalypse stared into the eyes of the monster. Death turned to him. "Why 
are you convinced he wants us?" 
  Apocalypse stared... "He needs us to reach his ultimate form. I stopped him 
once before.  He was dead. But I guess that weakling Valtron couldnt hold him 
at bay any longer. I should have taken him out when I had the chance."
   Death looked at Apocalypse. "We are more then a match for him." 
 Apocalypse stared. He had no words to speak. Galvatron was to calm. He was 
faceing two of the best in the pred armed forces yet... he isnt scared. He 
pulled his flame sword. Cried his words.. "LOng Live the Predacon Empire!" He 
ran at the beast with remarkable speed. Death followed from the right. Pulled 
out his reaper and headed towards the calm bot. The battle was on.
